description:
Nishikata really likes cats but doesn`t want Takagi-san to know.
But when he sees a very friendly cat, he can`t help it.
What is a guy to do?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cat / Taste / Portrait / Fortune Telling / Critical
Les chats / Les goûts et les couleurs / Portrait / Prédictions
ネコ / 好み / 似顔絵 / 占い / クリティカル
